DEMO.FEATURES.FEEDBACK.DESC: You will get a callback as users click any links on the toolbar.
DEMO.FEATURES.TITLE: Change the title
DEMO.FEATURES.TITLE.DESC: Change the title of window to your preferred name.
DEMO.FEATURES.TYPES: 3. Add different states with three types
DEMO.FEATURES.TYPES.BUTTON: Show the icon on the tool bar without any content page.
DEMO.FEATURES.TYPES.STATE: Show the icon on the tool bar with a content page.
DEMO.FEATURES.TYPES.CONTENT: Show a content page without any icon.
DEMO.FEATURES.DESC: When there are too many states on the toolbar, the states with button type will be fixed on the toolbar, the rest states will be sorted to a menu.
DEMO.FEATURES.NUMBER: Change the max number of state sorting
DEMO.FEATURES.NUMBER.DESC: Change the max number will help component to determine when should sort states.
DEMO.FEATURES.CUSTOMIZE: Add customized actions on the toolbar bar
DEMO.FEATURES.CUSTOMIZE.DESC: By using CdkPortal, you can add your actions on the toolbar.
DEMO.FEATURES.LOADING.DESC: Provide loading effect if you need to use async request.
